title: Spiritual Bioenergetics of Homoeopathic Materia Medica - Volume I by Yubraj Sharma
author: Yubraj Sharma
description: Interested in 'Spiritual Bioenergetics of Homoeopathic Materia Medica - Volume I' by Yubraj Sharma. Click here to learn more. Great price and fast delivery.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Bioenergetics of Homoeopathic Materia Medica - Volume I A homoeopathic materia medica of 151 well known old and new remedies, integrating the profiles with: - esoteric plant and animal sciences - alchemy of the minerals and elements - toxicological data - spiritual principles - anthroposophical medicine - astrological patterns - oriental medicine diagnosis - craniosacral therapy diagnosis with keynotes of the remedy mentals, generals, particulars, remedy relationships, and glossaries of basic principles. - Author: [Yubraj Sharma](/browse-by/author/yubraj-sharma/) - ISBN: 9781904472018 - 800 pages - Hardback - Published in 2004 - Printed in United Kingdom
